title: 3dAFNItoNIML
description: Dumps AFNI dataset header information to stdout in NIML format. Mostly for debugging and testing purposes!

data.title: Data flag
data.description: Also put the data into the output (will be huge).

ascii.title: ASCII flag
ascii.description: Format in ASCII, not binary (even huger).

tcp.title: TCP host:port
tcp.description: Instead of stdout, send the dataset to a socket. Implies '-data' as well.
